name: Yuya Matsuo
body:
## About

```js
let me = {
  name: 'Yuya Matsuo',
  aka: 'niu',
  skills: ['JavaScript', 'Node.js', 'Java', 'Android', 'Gear VR'],
  birthday: new Date(1987, 10, 24) // It's November!
};
```

I'm:

* software engineer working at [eje inc.](http://www.eje-c.com)
* main contributor of [kirinsan.org](http://kirinsan.org)
* [musician](https://soundcloud.com/niusounds). I like heavy metal! \m/

## Works

### [WONDER.NET](https://kirinsan-org.github.io/wmh2016/)

Web Music Hackathon #5 work

Very emotional visualizer!!

Note: WebCam and mic are required.

### [OtamaMIDI](https://kirinsan-org.github.io/OtamaMIDI/)

Web Music Hackathon #3 work

Play MIDI device with [Otamatone](http://www.otamatone.com/)!!

Note: Audio and MIDI interface are required.

### [Meganekko](https://github.com/ejeinc/Meganekko)

Java framework for Gear VR apps.

### [miku.js](https://github.com/ejeinc/miku.js)

JavaScript [Pocket Miku](http://vocaloid.wikia.com/wiki/Pocket_Miku) controlling library.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
